component.name: Aviator
component.summary: Your Video Copilot: AV1/OPUS Video Encoder

description.p: Aviator enables simple, easy-to-use video encoding for the word's most advanced open video codec, AV1. Encode your favorite media into super efficient files with incredible quality per bit, powered by the SVT-AV1 production encoder with Opus for audio encoding. The sky's the limit for your old home video collection & large 4k smartphone videos, and you can fly in style with a beautiful libadwaita interface. Take off with Aviator!

ul.li: Added support for incomplete shell themes
Fixed: Cannot change login screen logo from Flatpak version of the app
Prevent app launch when argument provided to `--verbosity` option is invalid

description.p: Warning: You will lose some settings after updating from v0.6 or any earlier version to this or any later version.

ul.li: Updated the info shown on app's software-store page
New App Icon that follows GNOME HIG
Only one instance of the app can be open at a time
When applying settings, the app does not freeze anymore
The app shows a "Log Out" dialog right after settings are applied
Added new dialogs to show errors to the user instead of panicking on the terminal
When applying current display settings, scaling is also applied (may not work on all systems)
